website_summaries.verdict: In spite of a few sub-par toys, this set is worth considering for the other toys it contains and the presentation box that makes it a nice gift for a cat lover.
pros: 12 assorted toys that come nicely packaged in a box for gifting
Includes some feather toys and toys with catnip
Soft toys in the set are well-made and easy for cats to bat around during play
cons: Some of the toys don't seem very well made, including the sparkle balls with metallic-looking threads that could easily be pulled out and ingested

customer_reviews.title: Great variety pack
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves several of these toys. She played with most of them. The only thing I want to note is that there are two that do fall apart quite easily. For safety reasons, I threw them out although my cat loved them the most. They were the red and blue sparkly wrinkle toy. It just shed a lot of metallic pieces. I didn't want my cat to choke on something or get it in her belly. Other than that, she loves all these toys. She especially enjoys chasing the little mice around. She throws them about the house. I really like how much she enjoys these. The balls are also great. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: G. C.

customer_reviews.title: Not the safest toys to get
customer_reviews.text: Two of the toy balls are dangerous -- they are cheaply made and the metallic looking strips pull right off and is definitely not safe for kittens if they ingest it (kind of like string). The rest of the toys are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Izaak

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for a cute selection of cat toys. These are not it. They are poorly made. The cheetah mouse toy came with a hole in it and an ear missing, the glitterballs shed dangerous plastic strings that come out easily, the wand has craft feathers that are sharp, the toys mice were not sewn shut and had sewing threads hanging out. I don't like writing bad reviews because I feel guilty doing so- but this is a very bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy L. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Good for a girl or boy
customer_reviews.text: There is a wand toy with feathers at the end. It's pretty short (maybe 2 feet long total), but my cat loves it. There are equal amounts of pink and blue toys (the wand is pink). The mice don't appear to have catnip in them, so the cat only bats around the mouse if I'm moving it with my hand. This could be a cute gift. If I had it to do over again, I'd probably just buy some toys individually (but I liked that it came in a cute package).
customer_reviews.author: S. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Live puffed heart
customer_reviews.text: My cats really like the puffed heart toy. They can easily fling to in the air and because of shape it spins a bit. Also have 2 cats that like to carry heart around in their mouths as if. Carrying a bird ever so gently. Wish I could buy a bag of these hearts alone.
customer_reviews.author: dw

customer_reviews.title: Great gift pack
customer_reviews.text: What a great collection, something for all of my cats. There are two toys in here my kitten doesn't stop playing with- the blue and red ball with foil on them. I'm sure the foil is no good for her though (like tinsel) but the pieces are small (like an inch or so) and she loves them so much I just said the heck with it. I would buy more of them but they aren't sold loose (to my knowledge), you must get the whole gift pack, so maybe another whole collection in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Nohavicka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mice Fanatics
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a mice fanatic and I was searching online to find him some new toys that I could buy in bulk. He's only 7 months old so he has plenty of energy. So far he's loved everything. His favorites are the rattle mice that make sounds. He'll play fetch with them for hours.
customer_reviews.author: alivia burke

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection
customer_reviews.text: Cute little gift box with a nice selection of kitty toys. The box was a bit squished so to amazon putting it into an envelope, it didn’t damage anything. Cat was happy as could be!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great value for kitten fun
customer_reviews.text: I'm a foster parent for shelter kittens and need lots of toys for them to play with. This was a great selection at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: M Trimbell

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these toys. Exactly as pictured. Durable toys. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Taya

customer_reviews.title: Cute Cat Toys
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved these! These are really great durable toys.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Workman

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for Kitten Work
customer_reviews.text: The kitten loved the toys. Some held up better than others. I stepped on two of the plastic balls and they shattered. One broke open while he was playing with it. No harm done. It's great to keep him occupied for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: ... all haphazadely hot glued on but other wise seem pretty quality.
customer_reviews.text: The eyes and noses for the mice are all haphazardly hot glued on but otherwise seem pretty quality. EDIT- So she ended up not really caring for many of these, but she isn't a huge fan of catnip either. But the blue and silver mouse is her ABSOLUTE favorite toy we've ever gotten her and she still carries it around and fetches it.
customer_reviews.author: RinnCity

customer_reviews.title: Less than half of the items where of interest.
customer_reviews.text: From what I can surmise, only less than half of the items had any appeal.
customer_reviews.author: gardener

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting this to be a little bit bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be a little bit bigger. There is more filling I think in the shredded paper than in the toys themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My indoor cat played with every single one of these toys. She is clearly bored. I liked that they seem durable and well made. There was even a small stick with feathers included. It was a good price for a few gifts for my happy kitty!
customer_reviews.author: helena joyce

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has loved every toy that comes out of this box so far. He only likes to pay with toys once and then loses interest, so it's great to have a variety of toys I can dole out one at a time. They're all super cute and pretty high quality. The price seems a tiny bit high but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: My cat did not really like anything in it she prefers the packaging to the actual toy. Everything seems well made and other pets may like it its always a gamble.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rebecca Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Very great set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a year or so ago and my cats still love them!
customer_reviews.author: Rerbrick

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: This product contains my cat's favorite toys. He loves rattle mice, and this comes with 4! This item is great quality for the price. I have bought it twice already. Where do cat toys disappear to!?
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My kitties love these toys
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love these toys. I dole them out one by one and so they last quite a while. There are many types: balls, mice, bells. A great treat for your kitty for at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Eulogia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My cats really liked the toys and it is helpful in determining what kind of toy your cat favors.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Brittany Trester

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and cat approved
customer_reviews.text: The cats loved playing with this and still are! Very long lasting and durable too. Arrving wise it was perfectly on time!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Some have metallic threads that my kitten could easily ingest. Tossed the ones I thought would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Most of the toys are cheap stuff. Some have metallic threads that my kitten could easily ingest. Tossed the ones I thought would be harmful to a kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L Dunsmore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of the toys for the price, it was excellent! I have a 3 month old kitten and she plays rough but all of the toys are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jclee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a friend for an xmas gift exchange since she had 2 cats. The cats approve
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bundle of toys
customer_reviews.text: My cat was thrilled to get this! Her favorite toy in here was the wand toy, but she has been having fun with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: They also make a great gift in just the package it self
customer_reviews.text: The cat loves these toys. They also make a great gift in just the package it self.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Carter

customer_reviews.title: A great variety of cat toys
customer_reviews.text: A great variety of cat toys. My new kitten loved them and has played with them consistently since the day we got them!
customer_reviews.author: Collette

customer_reviews.title: Super cute. My cat loved every toy in here ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. My cat loved every toy in here and I got a kick out of opening the box and seeing all the adorable toys as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love every toy that came in this box! Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Ally G

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bengal Cats!
customer_reviews.text: This contains a really nice variety of toys that my Bengal Cat loves!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: This is a cute kit. We only have one ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute kit. We only have one cat who will play with items that jingle, but the others will play with the rest of them.
customer_reviews.author: H. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: cat LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: bought for a friend and her cat LOVES it - great variety of toys...
customer_reviews.author: happy gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Good but damaged
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 5 stars but the package was badly damaged when it arrived. The toys were fine, but the box they were in was completely ripped on one side inside the enhanced plastic wrapping. Toys look good though!
customer_reviews.author: Galen

customer_reviews.title: I married The Grinch. True Story.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. My kitties are spoiled and deserve the best. These are well made,
customer_reviews.author: The Grinch Family

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: When buying the products look bigger..very small box..not a good value in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Set is a lot smaller than I thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: Set is a lot smaller than I thought it would be for the price, but it was a cute gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyn Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting more in box but what do cats know ...
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting more in box but what do cats know I give them toys they still want hair ties and boxes.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Great variety to keep your cat entertained
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten can't get enough of these toys! Everything is fun for her and I haven't had any problems cleaning them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cetin

customer_reviews.title: Great toys
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and my cats are obsessed with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wide selection
customer_reviews.text: This was offered at a great price and I love that it's a mix of things to try with your cat. As we were getting a new kitten, this was an economical way to get sort-of one of every toy, to see what he would like. Small warning: the sparkly balls loose their sparkle strings quickly, and get all over your floor; they may also be a safety hazard if one of the strings were to be swallowed. Most toys however were a hit, so I'm glad we tried this! Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: CO book lover!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my cat knew the package was for him.. he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Laurie-Anne Bollaro

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Your feline friend may be overwhelmed...
customer_reviews.text: ......with joy! My cats love these. They couldn't stop playing with the toys, and didn't know which toy to choose. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: My cat loved these! And true to cat form
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved these! And true to cat form, 99% of them ended up in unknown places within a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Latresa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good for getting to know a cat
customer_reviews.text: This is a good gift pack for a new cat, or a cat whose preferences you're unsure of. I deducted a star because a number of the toys are recolors - there's 2 hollow plastic balls with bells in, two tinselly balls, and 4 cloth-and-cardboard mice. That's not a problem if it turns out that the cat likes these toy types - but if they don't, you're left with extra copies of toys that they don't like.
customer_reviews.author: nelyk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful to have extra on hand. Cats love these toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the cat lover home
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift to a colleague wit several gates. Big hit,
customer_reviews.author: lisa vuocolo

customer_reviews.title: Package needs a lot of work sad face
customer_reviews.text: Ok first off this is a gift for my cat loving aunt The box was ruined and looked beat up. Its too embarrassing to give to her for her cats Boo
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my parents new kitty he loves everything.
customer_reviews.author: tina

product_meta.title: Cat Is Good 12-Piece Pounce Toy Gift Box – Pounce on It Assorted Toys Keep Cats and Kittens Entertained Safely
product_meta.description: Size:One SizeCats and kittens are good at entertaining themselves, especially when they have plenty of interesting toys available. That makes the PetEdge Cat Is Good 12-Piece Pounce Toy Gift Box a smart choice for cat lovers to purchase themselves or to give as a gift to other cat owners. The box contains 12 toys, including a feather wand, four rattle mice, two catnip mice, two sparkle balls, two plastic jingle balls and one Cat Is Good icon toy with catnip. Cats and kittens will love all of the variety in this Pounce on It gift box, and they’re sure to find toys to entertain them all day.
feature_bullets: Fun Toys for Cats – Both kittens and cats will love these toys, some of which make noise and will roll across the floor
Easy-to-Wrap Gift Box – This box of kitten toys is packaged perfectly to be wrapped for gift-giving
12 Different Toys – Your cats won’t become bored with this set, as there are 12 different toys included in the box
Rolling Balls – Kittens will love chasing the set’s sparkle balls and plastic jingle balls across the floor
Catnip Toys – A few of the toys in the gift box, including a Cat Is Good icon soft toy, contains catnip, which your cats and kittens will love
